Review Status

Member Fields
The following parts of this observation are contained within this resource.
Each field contains one data item and is stored as an item (slice) in the Observation.component element.
Associated Feature Type component [1..1]
Observed Count component [0..1]
Profile Fragments
The following are the fragments that are included in this profile. This is included for developers use to understand the hierarchy and commonality of disparate profiles..
Breast Body Location (Required) Fragment
Observation Leaf Fragment
Observation No Component Fragment
Observation NoDevice Fragment
Observation NoValue Fragment
